title: Mic below doesnt work after being in water
content:
Hello my phone was under water like 2 seconds. The day after it was not working. After starting up several times it seemed to be working fine. Until last night. When ik tried talking to the assistent it didnt respond. I know now the microphone below isn't working anymore. It doesn't record. When i filmed the mic recorded. So that's how i know its the lower mic. 
I tried resetting bleutooth wifi but that didn.t help. 
Could your help me

chris
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
